mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Cart(Cart_no, M_no, p_no, pp_size) VALUES(cart_no_seq.nextval, 1, #{p_no}, #{pp_size} )
mapper.select: select b.B_NAME, c.cart_no, c.m_no, c.p_no, c.pp_size p.P_NAME_EN, p.P_SIZE, p.b_no, p.P_RELEASE_PRICE from Cart c inner join PRODUCT p on c.p_no = p.p_no inner join brand_member b on p.b_no = b.b_no where c.m_no = 1 order by cart_no desc
